DescriptionData.Title: AJs Girls Striped Knee Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Our awesome striped knee high socks in junior size! Striped kids socks offer fun and vivid color combinations in two stripe or three stripe socks. They have a top comfort welt top and a cushioned foot. Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic in a junior length of 23", socks size 6 - 9 (approx. 8-12 yrs).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Tube socks with a comfort top welt and a cushioned foot
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
